channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump and AOC exchange furious blows online over Iran-focused impeachment push
item.description: Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (D-N.Y.) sparred online with President Trump on Tuesday after she said his unilateral strikes on Iran are grounds for im...

item.title: Exclusive: Thune plans make-or-break weekend votes on "big, beautiful bill"
item.description: Senate Majority Leader John Thune expects to start voting Friday on President Trump's " one big, beautiful bill ," he told Axios in an exclusive inter...

item.title: What increasing heat does to our bodies
item.description: With record high temperatures becoming the norm, humans are more regularly hitting the threshold of our ability to cope with heat. Why it matters: An ...

item.title: House, Senate briefings postponed after Iran ceasefire
item.description: Briefings for House members and senators on the situation in the Middle East that were scheduled for Tuesday have been postponed, Axios has learned. W...

item.title: Robert Garcia elected Oversight Committee ranking member in win for younger Democrats
item.description: House Democrats voted Tuesday to formally elect Rep. Robert Garcia (D-Calif.) as ranking member of the House Oversight Committee, sources familiar wit...

item.title: Trump criticizes Ocasio-Cortez in demeaning terms after she floats impeachment
item.description: The president also lashed out at two other female Democratic lawmakers, Reps. Jasmine Crockett (Texas) and Ilhan Omar (Minnesota).

item.title: Trump heads to NATO, minimizes time as he shrugs off global meetings
item.description: Trump is heading to NATO for a trip lasting barely a day. It’s the pattern of his second term — attend international meetings, but don’t stay long.

item.title: House Democrats pick Robert Garcia, 47, to lead them on Oversight Committee
item.description: Garcia is an up-and-coming sophomore from California who promised to usher in a new generation of leadership for Democrats on the committee.

item.title: Jan. 6 rioter ordered to pay $500K to widow of officer who killed himself
item.description: A federal jury held David Walls-Kaufman liable for assaulting police officer Jeffrey Smith during the U.S. Capitol riot and ordered him to pay damages...

item.title: Trump questions U.S. commitment to NATO defense
item.description: Trump, en route to the NATO summit, once again raises questions about his commitment to the alliance’s pledge of mutual defense.

item.title: Trump is under water on some of his top issues — including immigration, poll shows
item.description: The president’s approval rating had been ticking upward since its biggest drop in April.

item.title: Trump’s contract-cutting blitz rattles a once-flourishing DC industry
item.description: The General Services Administration, which oversees government contracting, is leading a review of more than 20,000 consulting agreements for what is ...

item.title: Trump’s chaotic economy is causing headaches for Democrats in New Jersey's governor race
item.description: The crowded contest in the Garden State shows how hard it is to address pocketbook issues.

item.title: Warren Buffett shocks shareholders by announcing his intention to retire at the end of the year
item.description: Earlier, Buffett warned Saturday about the dire global consequences of President Donald Trump's tariffs.

item.title: ‘Anything can happen’: Trump doesn't seem fazed by recession worries
item.description: Trump has blamed shaky economic numbers on his predecessor.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
